00028 ChunkBase::ChunkBase ( size_t firstDim, size_t secondDim, size_t thirdDim, size_t fourthDim )
00029 {
00030     const size_t idx[] = {firstDim, secondDim, thirdDim, fourthDim};
00031     init( idx );
00032     addNeededFromString( needed );
00033     LOG_IF( NDimensional<4>::volume() == 0, Debug, warning )
00034             << "Size " << fourthDim << "|" << thirdDim << "|" << secondDim << "|" << firstDim << " is invalid";
00035 }
00036 
00037 ChunkBase::~ChunkBase() { }
00038 
00039 }

00041 Chunk::Chunk( const TypePtrReference &src, size_t firstDim, size_t secondDim, size_t thirdDim, size_t fourthDim ):
00042     _internal::ChunkBase( firstDim, secondDim, thirdDim, fourthDim ),
00043     TypePtrReference( src )
00044 {
00045     assert( ( *this )->len() == volume() );
00046 }

00048 Chunk Chunk::cloneToMem( size_t firstDim, size_t secondDim, size_t thirdDim, size_t fourthDim )const
00049 {
00050     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> newSize = sizeToVector();
00051 
00052     if ( firstDim )newSize[0] = firstDim;
00053 
00054     if ( secondDim )newSize[1] = secondDim;
00055 
00056     if ( thirdDim )newSize[2] = thirdDim;
00057 
00058     if ( fourthDim )newSize[3] = fourthDim;
00059 
00060     const TypePtrReference cloned( get()->cloneToMem( newSize.product() ) );
00061     return Chunk( cloned, newSize[0], newSize[1], newSize[2], newSize[3] );
00062 }

00064 bool Chunk::makeOfTypeId( short unsigned int id )
00065 {
00066     if( typeID() != id ) {
00067         return makeOfTypeId( id, getScalingTo( id ) );
00068     }
00069 
00070     return true;
00071 }
00072 
00073 bool Chunk::makeOfTypeId( short unsigned int id, const scaling_pair &scaling )
00074 {
00075     if( typeID() != id ) { // if its not the same type - replace the internal TypePtr by a new returned from TypePtrBase::copyToNewById
00076         TypePtrReference newPtr = getTypePtrBase().copyToNewById( id, scaling ); // create a new TypePtr of type id and store it in a TypePtrReference
00077 
00078         if( newPtr.empty() ) // if the reference is empty the conversion failed
00079             return false;
00080 
00081         static_cast<TypePtrReference &>( *this ) = newPtr; // otherwise replace my own TypePtr with the new one
00082     }
00083 
00084     return true;
00085 }

00100 void Chunk::copyLine( size_t secondDimS, size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, Chunk &dst, size_t secondDimD, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const
00101 {
00102     const size_t idx1[] = {0, secondDimS, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00103     const size_t idx2[] = {sizeToVector()[0] - 1, secondDimS, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00104     const size_t idx3[] = {0, secondDimD, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00105     copyRange( idx1, idx2, dst, idx3 );
00106 }

00108 void Chunk::copySlice( size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, Chunk &dst, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const
00109 {
00110     const size_t idx1[] = {0, 0, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00111     const size_t idx2[] = {sizeToVector()[0] - 1, sizeToVector()[1] - 1, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00112     const size_t idx3[] = {0, 0, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00113     copyRange( idx1, idx2, dst, idx3 );
00114 }

00116 void Chunk::copyRange( const size_t source_start[], const size_t source_end[], Chunk &dst, const size_t destination[] ) const
00117 {
00118     LOG_IF( ! rangeCheck( source_start ), Debug, error )
00119             << "Copy start " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_start )
00120             << " is out of range (" << sizeToString() << ") at the source chunk";
00121     LOG_IF( ! rangeCheck( source_end ), Debug, error )
00122             << "Copy end " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_end )
00123             << " is out of range (" << sizeToString() << ") at the source chunk";
00124     LOG_IF( ! dst.rangeCheck( destination ), Debug, error )
00125             << "Index " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( destination )
00126             << " is out of range (" << sizeToString() << ") at the destination chunk";
00127     const size_t sstart = dim2Index( source_start );
00128     const size_t send = dim2Index( source_end );
00129     const size_t dstart = dst.dim2Index( destination );
00130     get()->copyRange( sstart, send, *dst, dstart );
00131 }
00132 
00133 size_t Chunk::cmpRange( size_t start, size_t end, const Chunk &dst, size_t destination ) const
00134 {
00135     return get()->cmp( start, end, *dst, destination );
00136 }
00137 size_t Chunk::cmpRange( const size_t source_start[], const size_t source_end[], const Chunk &dst, const size_t destination[] ) const
00138 {
00139     LOG_IF( ! rangeCheck( source_start ), Debug, error )
00140             << "memcmp start " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_start )
00141             << " is out of range (" << sizeToString() << ") at the first chunk";
00142     LOG_IF( ! rangeCheck( source_end ), Debug, error )
00143             << "memcmp end " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_end )
00144             << " is out of range (" << sizeToString() << ") at the first chunk";
00145     LOG_IF( ! dst.rangeCheck( destination ), Debug, error )
00146             << "Index " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( destination )
00147             << " is out of range (" << sizeToString() << ") at the second chunk";
00148     LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00149             << "Comparing range from " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_start ) << " to " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_end )
00150             << " and " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( destination );
00151     const size_t sstart = dim2Index( source_start );
00152     const size_t send = dim2Index( source_end );
00153     const size_t dstart = dst.dim2Index( destination );
00154     return cmpRange( sstart, send, dst, dstart );
00155 }
00156 size_t Chunk::cmpLine( size_t secondDimS, size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, const Chunk &dst, size_t secondDimD, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const
00157 {
00158     const size_t idx1[] = {0, secondDimS, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00159     const size_t idx2[] = {0, secondDimD, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00160     const size_t idx3[] = {sizeToVector()[0] - 1, secondDimD, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00161     return cmpRange( idx1, idx2, dst, idx3 );
00162 }
00163 size_t Chunk::cmpSlice( size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, const Chunk &dst, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const
00164 {
00165     const size_t idx1[] = {0, 0, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00166     const size_t idx2[] = {0, 0, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00167     const size_t idx3[] = {sizeToVector()[0] - 1, sizeToVector()[1] - 1, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00168     return cmpRange( idx1, idx2, dst, idx3 );
00169 }

00186 Chunk &Chunk::operator=( const Chunk &ref )
00187 {
00188     _internal::ChunkBase::operator=( static_cast<const _internal::ChunkBase &>( ref ) ); //copy the metadate of ref
00189     TypePtrReference::operator=( static_cast<const TypePtrReference &>( ref ) ); // copy the reference of ref's data
00190     return *this;
00191 }

00193 ChunkList Chunk::autoSplice ( uint32_t acquisitionNumberStride )const
00194 {
00195     if ( !valid() ) {
00196         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Cannot splice invalid Chunk (missing properties are " << this->getMissing() << ")";
00197         return ChunkList();
00198     }
00199 
00200     util::fvector4 offset;
00201     const util::fvector4 voxelSize = propertyValue( "voxelSize" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00202     util::fvector4 voxelGap;
00203 
00204     if( hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) )
00205         voxelGap = propertyValue( "voxelGap" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00206 
00207     const util::fvector4 distance = voxelSize + voxelGap;
00208     int32_t atDim = relevantDims() - 1;
00209 
00210     switch( atDim ) { // init offset with the given direction
00211     case readDim :
00212         offset = this->propertyValue( "readVec" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00213         break;
00214     case phaseDim:
00215         offset = this->propertyValue( "phaseVec" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00216         break;
00217     case sliceDim:
00218 
00219         if( this->hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00220             offset = this->propertyValue( "sliceVec" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00221         } else {
00222             const util::fvector4 read = this->propertyValue( "readVec" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00223             const util::fvector4 phase = this->propertyValue( "phaseVec" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00224             assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( read.sqlen(), 1 ) );
00225             assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( phase.sqlen(), 1 ) );
00226             offset[0] = read[1] * phase[2] - read[2] * phase[1];
00227             offset[1] = read[2] * phase[0] - read[0] * phase[2];
00228             offset[2] = read[0] * phase[1] - read[1] * phase[0];
00229         }
00230 
00231         break;
00232     case timeDim :
00233         offset = util::fvector4( 0, 0, 0, 1 );
00234     }
00235 
00236     // prepare some attributes
00237     assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( offset.sqlen(), 1 ) ); // it should be norm here
00238     const util::fvector4 indexOriginOffset = offset * distance[atDim];
00239     size_t cnt = 0;
00240     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Splicing chunk at dimenstion " << atDim + 1 << " with indexOrigin stride " << indexOriginOffset << " and acquisitionNumberStride " << acquisitionNumberStride;
00241     ChunkList ret = splice( ( dimensions )atDim ); // do low level splice - get the chunklist
00242     BOOST_FOREACH( ChunkList::reference ref, ret ) { // adapt some metadata in them
00243         util::fvector4 &orig = ref->propertyValue( "indexOrigin" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00244         uint32_t &acq = ref->propertyValue( "acquisitionNumber" )->cast_to<uint32_t>();
00245         orig = orig + indexOriginOffset * ( float )cnt;
00246         acq += acquisitionNumberStride * cnt; //@todo this might cause trouble if we try to insert this chunks into an image
00247         cnt++;
00248     }
00249     return ret;
00250 }
00251 
00252 ChunkList Chunk::splice ( dimensions atDim )const
00253 {
00254     ChunkList ret;
00255     //@todo should be locking
00256     typedef std::vector<TypePtrReference> TypePtrList;
00257     const util::FixedVector<size_t, n_dims> wholesize = sizeToVector();
00258     util::FixedVector<size_t, n_dims> spliceSize;
00259     spliceSize.fill( 1 ); //init size of one chunk-splice to 1x1x1x1
00260     //copy the relevant dimensional sizes from wholesize (in case of sliceDim we copy only the first two elements of wholesize - making slices)
00261     spliceSize.copyFrom( &wholesize[0], &wholesize[atDim] );
00262     //get the spliced TypePtr's (the volume of the requested dims is the split-size - in case of sliceDim it is rows*columns)
00263     const TypePtrList pointers = this->getTypePtrBase().splice( spliceSize.product() );
00264     //create new Chunks from this TypePtr's
00265     BOOST_FOREACH( TypePtrList::const_reference ref, pointers ) {
00266         boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> spliced( new Chunk( ref, spliceSize[0], spliceSize[1], spliceSize[2], spliceSize[3] ) );
00267         static_cast<util::PropMap &>( *spliced ) = static_cast<const util::PropMap &>( *this ); //copy the metadate of ref
00268         ret.push_back( spliced ); // store splice for return
00269     }
00270     return ret;
00271 }
00272 bool Chunk::swapAlong( Chunk &dst, const size_t dim, bool convertTransform ) const
00273 {
00274     size_t dims[] = { dimSize( 0 ), dimSize( 1 ), dimSize( 2 ), dimSize( 3 ) };
00275     dst.join( static_cast<util::PropMap>( *this ), false );
00276 
00277     if ( get()->swapAlong( *dst, dim, dims ) ) {
00278         if ( convertTransform ) {
00279             util::fvector4 read = getProperty<util::fvector4>( "readVec" );
00280             util::fvector4 phase = getProperty<util::fvector4>( "phaseVec" );
00281             util::fvector4 slice = getProperty<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec" );
00282             util::fvector4 origin = getProperty<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00283             boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<float> T( 3, 3 );
00284             T( 0, 0 ) = 1;
00285             T( 0, 1 ) = 0;
00286             T( 0, 2 ) = 0;
00287             T( 1, 0 ) = 0;
00288             T( 1, 1 ) = 1;
00289             T( 1, 2 ) = 0;
00290             T( 2, 0 ) = 0;
00291             T( 2, 1 ) = 0;
00292             T( 2, 2 ) = 1;
00293             T( dim, dim ) *= -1;
00294             dst.transformCoords( T );
00295         }
00296 
00297         return true;
00298     } else return false;
00299 }
